thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 13 of 265
thread.title: Erica

author: Erica
title: Erica
text:
I signed up for HelloFresh on a whim. My husband and I were bad at meal planning and we're starting to rely on fast food too much. I wanted variety. I have quite a few dietary restrictions and I loved the selection on HelloFresh compared to other food delivery services and that all the ingredients were separate so I could just leave them out or alter the recipe slightly to make a meal I could eat. Four or so weeks in and we haven't had a meal we didn't like and we are often surprised what we find ourselves liking best each week. And boy do the people at HelloFresh know how to make delicious sauces!!
I give it a 4/5 because sometimes some of the vegetables aren't in the best shape or we've got wilted greens on the first night of a new box. But they are always salvageable to some extent.
